io.zero88.jooqx

Interface ReactiveJooqxTx

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ReactiveJooqxBase<io.vertx.sqlclient.SqlConnection>, ReactiveJooqxConn, ReactiveSQLBatchExecutor, SQLBatchExecutor, SQLExecutor<io.vertx.sqlclient.SqlConnection,io.vertx.sqlclient.Tuple,ReactiveSQLPreparedQuery,io.vertx.sqlclient.RowSet<io.vertx.sqlclient.Row>,ReactiveSQLResultCollector>, SQLTxExecutor<io.vertx.sqlclient.SqlConnection,io.vertx.sqlclient.Tuple,ReactiveSQLPreparedQuery,io.vertx.sqlclient.RowSet<io.vertx.sqlclient.Row>,ReactiveSQLResultCollector,ReactiveJooqxTx>

    public interface ReactiveJooqxTx
extends ReactiveJooqxConn, SQLTxExecutor<io.vertx.sqlclient.SqlConnection,io.vertx.sqlclient.Tuple,ReactiveSQLPreparedQuery,io.vertx.sqlclient.RowSet<io.vertx.sqlclient.Row>,ReactiveSQLResultCollector,ReactiveJooqxTx>
    Represents for a reactive SQL transaction executor
    Since:
    1.0.0
